shows.title: Steph Grace
shows.desc: Her songs appear straightforward, but are intricate if you pay attention; her guitar lines are delicate; her voice authentically soulful. Whether belting out an upbeat mood-changer or whispering a downbeat groove-maker, on a large festival stage or in a cosy bar, Steph is a compelling presence. Little surprise that she captivated audiences on her recent tour supporting Passenger across Europe.
